title: Define your new password
sub_title: We’ve sent a 6-digit confirmation code to your email address {{email}}. Please enter the code in below box to verify your email.
forgot_password_error: An error occurred. Please try again.
forgot_password_success: The confirmation code was successfully sent to your email.
no_code: You did not receive a code?
password_do_not_match: The two passwords that you entered do not match!
password_rule_error: Password must be at least 10 character long with letters, capitals, numbers and special characters.
